document.title: Hot Topic: 2003-2004 State Revenue Estimates
document.abstract: The Tennessee General Assembly adopted the state budget for fiscal year 2003-2004; adopting revenue and spending bills that call for no new tax increases, but state shared revenues going back to cities and counties were cut by an estimated $35.5 million.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#95
